titleInfo.title: WAS committed to the Parish Jail

mods.abstract: WAS committed to the Parish Jail of the Parish of Jefferson, on the 2nd day of April, 1861, the dark griffe boy LOUIS, 5 feet 4 inches high; says he belongs to Charles Prince, of New Orleans. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away. GUY DREUX, Sheriff of Jefferson Parish. ap6

detail.title: The Carrollton sun. : (City of Carrollton, Parish of Jefferson, La.) 185?-1???

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
